title: Error Code 003: Something is up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching.
body: Title. I've been able to download all other patches over the past few months since I joined. The client restarted but then got stuck at 0.0/0.0 mb, ETA 0 min.

replies.body: Hey guys, our network team is digging into this now.  It's being tracked in [live incidents](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/HLBQzvEa-1121-patching-issues?show=flat) but things are starting to clear up.

Yeah, this is happening to me too. It has to be on their end, so I'm sure they're aware and working on it. Sadly, the PBE is also down for maintenance so it looks like I won't be playing any League this afternoon :/
